member.name: T:NLog.EntityFramework.EntityFrameworkTarget
member.summary: An NLog target that writes logging messages using an ADO.NET provider that is configurable via an Entity Framework connection string.

member.name: M:NLog.EntityFramework.EntityFrameworkTarget.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new Entity Framework log target.

member.name: M:NLog.EntityFramework.EntityFrameworkTarget.Write(NLog.LogEventInfo)
member.param: Event to write to the log.

member.name: P:NLog.EntityFramework.EntityFrameworkTarget.ConnectionStringName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the connection string to be used for this log target.

member.name: P:NLog.EntityFramework.EntityFrameworkTarget.KeepConnection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to keep the database connection open between the log events.

member.name: P:NLog.EntityFramework.EntityFrameworkTarget.CommandText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the SQL command to be run on each log level.

member.name: P:NLog.EntityFramework.EntityFrameworkTarget.Parameters
member.summary: Gets the collection of parameters. Each parameter contains a mapping between NLog layout and a database named or positional parameter.

member.name: T:NLog.EntityFramework.Strings
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:NLog.EntityFramework.Strings.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NLog.EntityFramework.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:NLog.EntityFramework.Strings.InvalidContainerErrorFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The database connection container '{0}' was not found..
